Title: Multivalued visualizer
Description: This application visualizes the multi-valued surfaces.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

 This application visualizes the multi-valued surfaces.

For example: 

We have a set of experimental points.

Loop indicates the presence of ambiguity.

Points are given as simple unsorted list. Program handles and visualizes them as surface.

 

How to use:

  1. Import points or open binary file with handled points
  2. Expand "Surface" and choose rendering mode

Program released with support of 3D. You can rotate, scale, translate using mouse. 

Also you can:

  • Save or load handled points to binary file
  • Save a working surface as Jpeg images
  • Change front and background brushes
  • Change axis extensions
  • Change mouse sensitivity

Notice: For tests this program you can click tab "Tests" and select figure.
